content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) 
-  Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5) 
-  Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5) 
-  Chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chests
-  Ensure the chest contains the item being extracted before attempting extraction.
### Errors when mining with burner mining drill
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue mining.
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up to avoid waiting for source items.
